text: Current address: Drug Metabolism and Pharmacokinetics, Covance Laboratories Inc., Madison, WI, USA Patients commonly take complementary medicines in conjunction with warfarin yet evidence supporting the safety or the risk of a herb–drug interaction is lacking.
label: Drug

text: The aim of this study was to investigate the possible impact of two commonly used herbal medicines, garlic and cranberry, on the pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of warfarin in healthy male subjects.
label: Herb name
Herb name
Drug
Pathology
Sex

text: An open-label, three-treatment, randomized crossover clinical trial was undertaken and involved 12 healthy male subjects of known CYP2C9 and VKORC1 genotype.
label: Study
Cohort
Pathology
Parameter

text: A single dose of 25 mg warfarin was administered alone or after 2 weeks of pretreatment with either garlic or cranberry.
label: Frequency
Amount
Drug
Duration
Herb name
Herb name

text: Warfarin enantiomer concentrations, INR, platelet aggregation and clotting factor activity were measured to assess pharmacokinetic and pharmacodynamic interactions between warfarin and herbal medicines.
label: Drug
Parameter
Parameter
Parameter
Parameter
Drug

text: Cranberry significantly increased the area under the INR–time curve by 30% when administered with warfarin compared with treatment with warfarin alone.
label: Herb name
Parameter
Amount
Drug
Drug

text: Cranberry did not alter S- or R-warfarin pharmacokinetics or plasma protein binding.
label: Herb name
Drug
Parameter

text: Co-administration of garlic did not significantly alter warfarin pharmacokinetics or pharmacodynamics.
label: Herb name
Drug
Parameter

text: Both herbal medicines showed some evidence of VKORC1 (not CYP2C9) genotype-dependent interactions with warfarin, which is worthy of further investigation.
label: Parameter
Parameter
Drug

text: Cranberry alters the pharmacodynamics of warfarin with the potential to increase its effects significantly.
label: Herb name
Drug

text: Co-administration of warfarin and cranberry requires careful monitoring.
label: Drug
Herb name
